meta.description: Tiggidoo, new residential cleaning service platform! Find a housekeeper, among qualified professionals in housekeeping

section_1.title: Tiggidoo connects professional residential housekeepers and their future clients
section_1.paragraph_1: Free of charge, without commitment or complications, the Tiggidoo platform allows you to receive job offers and manage them as you see fit.
section_1.paragraph_2: Enjoy integrated management tools on your ToDoo account specially designed to make your job easier.
section_1.paragraph_3: Tiggidoo is the ideal solution for all self-employed workers in residential housekeeping who are looking to increase their income.

section_2.title: A platform that improves your organization on a daily basis
section_2.li2: Simple and easy creation of your ToDoo account
section_2.li5: Technical support from the Tiggidoo team

section_3.title: How does it work?
section_3.description_1: You are the boss! You decide where and when you work.
section_3.description_2: Bingo! Your profile has been selected by your future client:
section_3.step_1: Be immediately notified by email when a new offer has arrived on your ToDoo account.
section_3.step_2: View the client’s offer which you can accept or refuse.
section_3.step_3: Perform a quality cleaning service and receive a positive rating on your profile.
section_3.step_4: Claim your payment quickly and securely.

section_4.title: Offer your housekeeping services with Tiggidoo

step_1.title: Answer a few questions
step_1.description: Complete the online registration form. Quick and simple, this allows the Tiggidoo team to pre-select future ToDoo.

step_2.title: Participate in a remote interview
step_2.description: At this stage, a virtual interview of a few minutes allows us to define both sides’ expectations. We will also validate your information and respond to your questions.

step_3.title: Join the ToDoo squad
step_3.description: Your profile will be online as soon as your registration is complete. You will receive email notifications as soon as an offer matches your selected criteria.

section_6.title: Ready to increase your income?
section_6.description: Start the recruitment process now. You will get an answer in less than 48 hours.

section_7.title: The 4 essential criteria to integrate the Tiggidoo platform
section_7.paragraph_1: The Tiggidoo platform connects people looking for quality cleaning services and self-employed housekeeping experts. Trust, respect and commitment to quality are the core values of our company. This is why you must meet a few criteria to become a ToDoo and receive service requests on our platform.

step_1.title: A verified identity
step_1.description: For obvious security reasons, we verify the identity of all self-employed workers who register on the Tiggidoo platform.

step_2.title: A valid bank account
step_2.description: You must have a bank account in your name to receive payment for carrying out your housekeeping services.

step_3.title: Access to the Internet
step_3.description: Whether from a computer or a smartphone, an internet connection is essential to operate smoothly on the Tiggidoo platform.

step_4.title: Respect our code of conduct
step_4.description: In order to provide impeccable service to each customer, you must agree to respect our general conditions, the terms of each service and our code of conduct.

section_8.title: A 100% human service
section_8.description: Do you need additional information? Don’t hesitate to ask us your questions, a human will happily answer you as fast as possible.

validations.telephoneFilds: The phone must have a minimum of 10 digits
validations.photo: A photo is required for registration
validations.cellPhoneLabelError: This email and phone number already exists

FormPersonalDetails.title: Join the Todoo team today!
FormPersonalDetails.description1: To join the Tiggidoo platform, please fill out this form. We will review your
FormPersonalDetails.description2: application and get back to you within 48 hours

groupCheckBox_2.title: Are you over 18 years old and legally authorized to work in Canada?

groupCheckBox_3.title: Do you have a criminal history?

FormPersonalBackground.title: What is your story?

groupCheckBox_1.title: Have you ever worked as a housekeeper?

FormPersonalBackground.referencesTitle: Please fill in the contact information of two of your previous employers

groupCheckBox_2.title: Why do you wish to be a part of the Tiggidoo platform?

FormAdditionalInformation.title: A few things about you
FormAdditionalInformation.subtitle: We need a little bit more information about you

groupCheckBox_1.title: Do you have a smartphone with access to data?

FormAdditionalInformation.paragraph: At Tiggidoo, communication is essential. We have to be able to reach each other at any moment. This is why we insist that having a smartphone with data is a necessity

groupCheckBox_2.title: Do you have any allergies or health problems?

FormAdditionalInformation.paragraph_2: Not specifying the allergy or health issue can result in your application being rejected
FormAdditionalInformation.paragraphPhoto: Attach a professional photo of yourself. This will be used to create your user profile on the platform

Confirmation.title: Thank you
Confirmation.subTitle: Your from is being reviewed by our team
Confirmation.description1: Humans are at the core of our values and we pride ourselves in carefully studying each application
Confirmation.description2: We will contact you once a decision has been made regarding your file
